entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 3 April 2023
